text: The 2019–20 season was 3rd season in the top Ukrainian football league for FC Lviv. Lviv competed in Premier League and Ukrainian Cup. ==Players== ===Squad information=== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:90%; width:80%" |- !style="background:#8B1A1A;
